title: Fix a few bugs.
message:
Fix a few bugs.

* Particles would still be paused after going to the settings menu and tapping
on the "Back" button.
* Lose the sticky immersive mode when going back to the main screen from the
settings menu.
* Text was not validated in some cases.

title: Version 1.1.0: Fix crash on some devices. Add a Settings menu
message:
Version 1.1.0: Fix crash on some devices. Add a Settings menu

Set renderscriptTargetApi to 18 instead of 19 to fix some crashes
with some decices.
Add a Settings menu. The settings icon is invisible by default.
Need to tap on the top right corner to display the icon, and then
tap on the icon within 4 seconds. The Settings menu lets the user
set the number of particles, the size of the particles, the number
of attration points, background color the particles colors, and
the force coefficients.

title: Version 1.0.1: fix bug for some devices running Android 4.4
message:
Version 1.0.1: fix bug for some devices running Android 4.4

Somehow need to downgrade to the Android SDK Build-tools 19.1 to
fix a crash with some devices running Android 4.4: with a version
higher than 19.1 the Render scripts cannot be created, resulting in
a crash... Even the most basic script generates an exception. This
seems to happen only for devices running 4.4.

title: Change version code and add *.apk in the .gitignore file.
message: Change version code and add *.apk in the .gitignore file.
